confidentiality_clause.name: Confidentiality Clause Presence
confidentiality_clause.description: Document must contain a confidentiality clause protecting sensitive information

term_duration.name: Contract Term Duration
term_duration.description: Contract must specify a clear start and end date or duration

termination_clause.name: Termination Clause
termination_clause.description: Document must include termination conditions and notice period

governing_law.name: Governing Law Clause
governing_law.description: Contract must specify the governing law jurisdiction

indemnification.name: Indemnification Clause
indemnification.description: Must include indemnification provisions for liability protection

ip_ownership.name: Intellectual Property Ownership
ip_ownership.description: Clearly defines ownership of intellectual property created during contract

payment_terms.name: Payment Terms
payment_terms.description: Specifies payment amounts, schedules, and methods

limitation_liability.name: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.description: Includes reasonable limitation of liability clauses

dispute_resolution.name: Dispute Resolution Mechanism
dispute_resolution.description: Specifies dispute resolution process (arbitration, mediation, litigation)

assignment_clause.name: Assignment Clause
assignment_clause.description: Addresses whether contract can be assigned to third parties

force_majeure.name: Force Majeure Clause
force_majeure.description: Includes force majeure provisions for unforeseen circumstances

notices.name: Notices Provision
notices.description: Specifies how formal notices should be delivered

entire_agreement.name: Entire Agreement Clause
entire_agreement.description: States that the document represents the entire agreement

severability.name: Severability Clause
severability.description: Includes severability clause for invalid provisions

amendment_process.name: Amendment Process
amendment_process.description: Specifies how the contract can be amended
